title: #7 - A Brain Damaged Donald Trump? - The Delusions of Lenny Dykstra
description:
This week, we look at a World Series hero, who had no problem hurling himself into walls, or claiming that he was a business mogul, who could tolerate nothing less than the very best of everything, including his $500 fart ties. Slap a baseball sized wad of chew into your mouth, and join us for Lenny Dykstra!! Check us out, every Tuesday. We will continue to bring you the biggest idiots in sports history!

Hosted by James Pietragallo & Jimmie Whisman


 

New episodes every Tuesday!!

Please subscribe, rate, and review!

Listen on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, or wherever you listen to podcasts!

Head to shutupandgivememurder.com for all things Crime in Sports!

For merchandise: crimeinsports.threadless.com

Check out James and Jimmie's other show: Small Town Murder

 

Follow us on social media!

Facebook: facebook.com/crimeinsports

Instagram: instagram.com/smalltownmurder

Twitter: twitter.com/MurderSmall

 

Contact the show: crimeinsports@gmail.com

Donate on Patreon: patreon.com/crimeinsports

PayPal: paypal.me/crimeinsports

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
